metadata.synopsis: A one-liner narrator dialog for all dancing skeletons in the circus.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Circus-82; 45; -31, talk to any of the skeletons.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Little remains of the person this skeleton once was - only polished bone and brittle teeth.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The skeleton looks beyond you, frozen - awaiting command from its mistress.*
